import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; import './HomeSlider.css'; import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css'; import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css'; export default class HomeSlider extends Component { render() { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, arr }; return (
); } }
